title: Rimworld
shortDescription:
A complex story-generator disguised as a survival-sim colony-builder.
While it's graphics are not outstanding, the simplified artstyle allows for very detailed situations.

images.title: Rimworld title image, showcasing the different storytellers.
A rimworld colony under the attack of mechanoids, its in shambles and burning.
A rimworld screenshot of a colony under attack, its showcasing the medical tab.
A rimworld screenshot of a colony under attack, with colonists hiding behind cover.
A rimworld screenshot of a colony in building process. Theres several unfinished wooden houses.
A rimworld screenshot of a colony under mechanoid attack, theres several laser beams soaring across the screen.
A rimworld screenshot of a colony using mechanoids as worker robots.
